BENEFITS.description: By providing customers an offer that perfectly fits their needs and budget, the likelihood of them accepting the quote is significantly higher. This translates into a quantifiable increase in your business's revenue and profitability.

three.description:
By knowing the value of your product or service in real-time, the customer can accept or reject your proposal without wasting valuable time.

This allows your business to focus efforts on customers who will make the <0>perfect price-quality match.</0>

one.quote: Since I started using Qantto, my service quoting process has become incredibly easy and fast. The platform is intuitive and allows me to generate professional quotes in minutes. Now I can spend more time serving my clients and growing my business. Thanks, Qantto!

two.name: Camila Soto
two.quote: Qantto has revolutionized how I manage my service quotes. Before, I spent hours calculating costs and preparing documents. With Qantto, everything is done automatically, saving me time and effort. Additionally, the accuracy of the quotes has helped me improve profitability and avoid costly errors. I recommend Qantto to all entrepreneurs and professionals looking to simplify their quoting process.

three.name: Andrés Pérez

The platform is user-friendly and customizable, allowing me to tailor quotes to each client's specific needs. I am delighted with the results I have achieved with Qantto and cannot imagine my business without this valuable tool.

BANNER3.title: Companies and entrepreneurs are <0>increasing their revenue with Qannto</0>
BANNER3.desc: ...It's data and it has to be given...

one.question: What is Qantto?
one.answer:
At Qantto, we understand that quoting products and services can be a complicated task and consume many technological and human resources. That's why we've created a technological tool that allows you to customize every aspect of the quote and generate hundreds of proposals automatically and efficiently, in real-time, 24/7.

Our application is designed to help businesses, enterprises, and individuals save time and money in the quoting process, eliminating the need for a large sales team and allowing you to focus on what matters most: closing the sale.

two.question: How does it work?
two.answer:
Imagine being able to deliver customized and automatic quotes to your clients 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, without having to invest in a sales team and dedicate hours to quoting tasks. With Qantto, this dream is a reality.

The process is easy and fast.

You don't need technical knowledge. With the following simple steps, you can get started. It will take you 5 minutes to do it.

First: create an account and select a plan. You will always have the free plan available. We don't ask for a credit card.

Second: customize the landing page where your clients will go to get a quote. For example, qantto.io/mycompany. Your company's name, a description, and the logo.

Third: create the services and subservices you offer and configure the price parameters for each option.

Fourth: share the link generated by the platform with your clients. Now your clients can automatically create quotes and receive a real-time estimate, without you or your sales team having to spend valuable hours of work. Instead, focus on your potential clients and closing the deal.

three.question: Why choose us?
three.answer: With Qantto, you can save time and money in the quoting process, allowing you to focus on growing your business. Our application is easy to use, fully customizable, and, best of all, automatic. This allows you to adapt it to the needs of your business and your clients. In addition, we provide technical support and personalized advice to assist you in the implementation process. Don't wait any longer, join Qantto and save valuable time and resources for your organization.

four.question: How is the tool customized for my business?
four.answer:
Step by step:

1. Create an account and select a plan: as a customer, you need to create an account on Qantto and select the plan that best suits your needs. You can choose a paid plan or use the free option to try the tool. We don't ask for a credit card.

2. Customize the platform: Once registered and with an active plan, you can customize the tool according to your business. You can add your brand, a description of your company, and configure the services you offer.

3. Configure service parameters and features: For each service, the user can configure specific parameters or features, such as materials used, estimated time, required quantity, among others. These parameters will help calculate the value of each service.

4. Validate final costs: After configuring the questions and services, the user can validate the final costs of the services provided by Qantto. This will allow them to have a clear view of the prices and make adjustments if necessary.

5. Save the configuration and share the link: Once the customization is complete, the user can save the configuration and generate a unique link to share with their clients. This will allow them to access the tool and start quoting the services offered.

five.question: Do I need technical knowledge or third parties to use it?
five.answer: No, using Qantto does not require advanced technical knowledge or the intervention of third parties. The initial setup process involves defining the options and possible answers for each question and assigning them a value (price). This configuration can be done by the business owner or the person in charge of sales. Once this initial configuration is complete, you can use Qantto autonomously and without the need for additional technical knowledge.

six.question: How does the tool ensure that the quote it provides is accurate and reliable?
six.answer:
Qantto relies on the configuration made by the user to calculate the quote for each service according to the established requirements. The user has the ability to configure their own prices and specify the details needed for each project.

However, it is important to note that each project is unique and may have additional specific requirements. As a result, the value provided by the tool is an estimate and could vary up to 20% depending on individual requirements.

seven.question: What security measures are taken to protect my clients' data?
seven.answer: We take security measures to protect customer data. Data encryption, restricted access, data backup and recovery, protection against threats and vulnerabilities are used, and data protection regulations are complied with. These measures ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of customer information.

eight.question: What type of technical support or guidance is offered after the implementation of the tool?
eight.answer: We offer a robust technical support service and guidance after the implementation of the tool. Our support team is available to assist you with any technical inquiries or issues you may face. Additionally, we have expert advisors who will provide guidance in tool configuration and help you optimize your processes. We are committed to providing ongoing support to ensure the success of your business with Qantto.

Welcome to the era of AI and automation. Increase your conversion rate by automating the sales process.
